Hi Kim,

Sorry about that. I understand what you mean now.

If you’d like us to install a plugin on the website, we can manually upload it on our end. Could you please share the plugin file or let us know the plugin name if it’s available on WordPress.org?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Kind regards,

Hi Rica,

Thank you, though I haven't lost access to the back end, just I don't seem to have the ability to add a plugin. Like that page is just not there in my menu.
Maybe I'm just being a numpty and I can't see it, but I just wanted to see if that was something that had been controlled from your end.

Kind regards,

Kim

Hi Kim,

I’ve checked the site’s back end and confirmed that your email is registered as an admin user. To help you regain access, I’ve sent a password reset link to your email address.

Please don’t hesitate to reach out if you need any further assistance.

Best regards,
